entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 17 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 11 except minus 17 inland. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023
